page.title: 05Education and Parents
page.content: Mostly Mums come to school because Dads are at work. The best time for Dads to come is at night when they see our work and talk to teachers or watch plays and concerts.Some parents have a bad attitude to school because they did not like it when they were little. Teachers encourage parents to come to school and they can show them how we learn and then parents can help us. A few schools have a Parent-Teacher Association . The P.T.A. organise events like jumble sales and dances to raise money for the School Fund.Our fund buys things like Video Machines and Microcomputers. We have just had our first ever Parent-Governor Elections. Every school now has two Parent Governors. The Headteacher will make a report to the Governors every term and they will understand more about the school.
